data.name: chain/hint/changeToPveOrRandom
data.value: SELECT RANDOM BATTLE OR PROVING GROUND MODE

data.name: chain6/hint/buyFreeSlot
data.value: CLICK ON CORRESPONDING SLOT TO PURCHASE IT

data.name: hangarTutorial/personalCase/perks
data.value: TRAINED CREW MEMBER SKILLS AND PERKS

data.name: hangarTutorial/technicalMaintenance/costAndApply
data.value: TOTAL MAINTENANCE COST AND CONFIRMATION BUTTON

data.name: messages/request-bonus-failed
data.value: An error occurred: unable to proceed to the next mission. Please contact Technical Support Service or try again later.

data.name: messages/tutorial-disabled
data.value: Unable to continue: tutorial is not available on this server.

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest4
data.value: A single-use 100% discount on purchasing a slot

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest5
data.value: The Tetrarch light tank for five battles with crew members trained to 100%

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest5/altBonus
data.value: You receive 10,000 credits, because you already have this vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest5/kr
data.value: The T14 heavy tank for five battles with crew members trained to 100%

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest6
data.value: A single-use 100% discount on converting Combat Experience to Free Experience (up to 1,000 XP) with no time restrictions

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest7
data.value: A single-use 100% discount on Tank Academy for all crew members upon purchase of a new vehicle

data.name: tutorialQuest/award/quest8
data.value: A 100% discount on Premium Account for 3 days

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest10
data.value: Congratulations! You have showed steady progress in the game. New missions and events are now available.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest11
data.value: Congratulations! You have learned how to give first aid in battle. Remember that injured crew members are significantly less effective at performing their duties; therefore, you should try to heal them as soon as you can.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest12
data.value: Congratulations! You have learned how to use Repair Kits. Remember that damaged or destroyed modules significantly reduce vehicle characteristics in battle and sometimes increase the chance of fire or ammo rack explosion.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest13
data.value: Congratulations! You have learned how to use Fire Extinguishers. Remember that a vehicle on fire quickly loses its hit points and working modules; therefore, try to extinguish fire as fast as you can.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest14
data.value: Congratulations! You have learned to mount equipment that can be demounted for free (simple equipment) or for a fee (complex equipment) if necessary, and then sent to the Depot or transferred to another vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest2
data.value: Congratulations! You have fought your first battle and earned credits and Combat Experience. Now we will show you how you can spend them.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest3
data.value: Congratulations! You have just upgraded your vehicle. Now try out the effectiveness of the newly mounted modules in a few battles.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest4
data.value: Congratulations! You have purchased a vehicle of a higher tier. The higher the tier of the vehicle you drive into battle, the more credits you earn after the battle; however, the difficulty of the game will also increase.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest5
data.value: Congratulations! Now you know how to enlarge the Garage. You can also purchase a slot when purchasing a new vehicle. To free up a slot, you can sell one of your vehicles.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest6
data.value: Congratulations! You have fought the required number of battles in the %(vehName)s.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest7
data.value: Congratulations! You have learned how to convert Combat Experience to Free Experience.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest8
data.value: Congratulations! Now you have a wide selection of vehicles to research. Pick a high tier vehicle and research all vehicles leading to it.

data.name: tutorialQuest/awardWindow/description/quest9
data.value: Congratulations! Your Premium Account will be active for the selected duration. You can extend your Premium Account after it expires.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest1
data.value: Complete the Battle Tutorial to learn basic battle principles.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest10
data.value: Research and purchase any Tier IV vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest11/chain
data.value: Purchase a First Aid Kit and equip it in a consumable slot.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest11/video
data.value: Use a First Aid Kit to heal an injured crew member.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest12/chain
data.value: Purchase a Repair Kit and equip it in a consumable slot.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest12/video
data.value: Use a Repair Kit to repair a damaged or destroyed module.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest13/chain
data.value: Purchase a Fire Extinguisher and equip it in a consumable slot.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest13/video
data.value: Enter a battle with a Fire Extinguisher equipped.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest2
data.value: Fight one battle against real enemies (in the Random Battle mode) or bots (in the Proving Ground mode).

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest3
data.value: Research and mount a vehicle module.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest4
data.value: Research and purchase any Tier II vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest5
data.value: Purchase a slot for a vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest7
data.value: Convert Combat Experience earned on rented or Elite vehicles to Free Experience.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest8
data.value: Research and purchase any Tier III vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/condition/quest9
data.value: Use the 100% discount on purchasing Premium Account.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest1
data.value: Welcome! This training will help you to quickly learn the basics of the game and join the united community of World of Tanks players.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest10
data.value: The purpose of different vehicles becomes more obvious at higher tiers; some vehicles deal huge damage, others break through defensive lines and hold positions, and others are used as scouts. Try various types of vehicles in battle to find the one that matches your play style.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest11
data.value: There is a category of game items called "Consumables". To view the list of Consumables available for purchase, click on the corresponding slot (or go to the Store). Small First Aid Kits heal one crew member. Large First Aid Kits add a bonus to protection from critical hits and heal all injured crew members.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest12
data.value: Small Repair Kits are used for full and immediate repair of one damaged module or two damaged tracks. Large Repair Kits add a bonus to repair speed and repair all damaged modules.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest13
data.value: There is a chance that a precise hit from the enemy will set your vehicle on fire. Fire inflicts serious harm and damages modules; therefore, it should be your priority to extinguish fires as quickly as possible. When used, Manual Fire Extinguishers put out fire. Automatic Fire Extinguishers reduce the chance of fire and are automatically activated when your vehicle is set on fire.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest14
data.value: Additional equipment will help you to make your vehicle even more effective by improving its characteristics. Choose wisely, as only three equipment slots are available for each vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest2
data.value: You are about to face a real enemy. It is time to join your first real battle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest3
data.value: When you purchase a vehicle, it is not as effective as it can be because it has standard modules mounted. To improve vehicle characteristics, research, purchase, and mount better modules.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest4
data.value: Each nation in the game has various technical branches. When you start with a Tier I vehicle, you are free to select any branch you wish to reach the cherished vehicle of the maximum tier.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest5
data.value: Slots in the Garage are used to store vehicles. Each vehicle in the Garage uses one slot, so make sure that there is a free slot before purchasing a vehicle.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest6
data.value: Premium vehicles earn more credits and experience in each battle. You can purchase them in the Store or on the game portal, or rent some of them for a specified period.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest7
data.value: Combat Experience earned in Elite or Premium vehicles can be converted to Free Experience that can be used to research any vehicle or module. In addition, about 5% of all experience earned in each battle is converted to Free Experience.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest8
data.value: The higher the tier of your vehicle, the more obvious its role in battle. Spend Combat Experience to research new vehicles and join battles in them.

data.name: tutorialQuest/description/quest9
data.value: Premium Account allows you to earn more credits and experience in any vehicle, which saves time and speeds up research.
